name: computerpos-pro
description: ComputerPOS Pro - Phần Mềm Bán Máy Tính Để Bàn & Linh Kiện

scripts.deploy:production: astro build && wrangler pages deploy ./dist --env production
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy ./dist --project-name=pos-frontend --compatibility-date=2025-07-19
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy ./dist --project-name=pos-frontend-dev && cd server && wrangler deploy --env development
scripts.db:migrate: wrangler d1 migrations apply computerpos-pro-db --env production
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
